physical.title: Physical Test
physical.subtitle: Assess your physical condition
physical.intro: Through scientific fitness testing, understand your physical condition and create a personalized exercise plan
physical.fillDataHint: Please fill in your basic information and test results accurately
physical.resultsIntro: Based on your test data, we provide the following assessment
physical.advice1: Recommend 3-4 aerobic sessions per week, 30-45 minutes each
physical.advice2: Strengthen training, focus on core muscles
physical.advice3: Maintain good sleep habits, ensure adequate rest
physical.advice4: Balanced diet, increase protein and vitamin intake

talent.title: Talent Assessment
talent.subtitle: Discover your unique strengths
talent.intro: Discover your talents, understand your potential, and get guidance for personal development
talent.instruction2: Each question has 4 options, choose the one that best fits you
talent.instruction3: Answer based on real situations, there are no right or wrong answers
talent.instruction4: Results will help you understand your personal strengths
talent.question: Question
talent.talentResultsIntro: Based on your answers, we analyzed the following strengths
talent.pathAdvice1: Focus on developing your primary strength
talent.pathAdvice2: Look for opportunities that leverage your strengths
talent.pathAdvice3: Collaborate with people who have complementary strengths
talent.pathAdvice4: Keep learning, transform strengths into professional skills

questions.q2: When facing pressure and challenges, you usually:
questions.q2o1: Make detailed plans to solve step by step
questions.q3o4: Completing tasks in an orderly manner
questions.q4: When learning new skills, you prefer:
questions.q5o2: Coming up with a brilliant idea

traits.leadershipDesc: Natural leader, good at guiding and motivating others
traits.innovationDesc: Creative, good at finding new solutions
traits.harmonyDesc: Good at building relationships and creating harmonious team atmosphere
traits.executionDesc: Efficient executor, able to turn ideas into reality
